name: @musistudio/claude-code-router
description: Use Claude Code without an Anthropics account and route it to another LLM provider

scripts.build: esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/cli.js && shx cp node_modules/tiktoken/tiktoken_bg.wasm dist/tiktoken_bg.wasm
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch 'src/**' --ext ts --exec 'npm run build && node dist/cli.js'

author: musistudio
